name: Twilight Dice
description:
Twilight Dice is a companion app for game night for iPhone, iPad, and Mac.

Roll a die. Modify it. Roll again and add them up. When your turn is over, simply swipe down to clear. A minimal interface with a few elegant features means Twilight Dice plays nice with the rulesets, resources, and gaming environments you love most.

With SplitView (iPad/Mac) and SlideOver (iPad), Twilight Dice shares your screen space with your GM notes, your character sheet, or your virtual game table of choice. And a long-press menu on the home screen puts your most-used rolls a touch away.

FEATURES
* Roll and modify multiple d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20 dice
* Roll a d2 (Coin Flip), d100, or Fudge roll
* Re-roll your entire dice pool or re-roll and remove individual die
* Quickly clear your rolls with a swipe gesture
* Critical min and max identifiers on die and single rolls
* Multitasking with SplitView and SlideOver

THEMES
Customize Twilight Dice with Twilight, Night, and Day themes

HOME SCREEN QUICK ACTIONS
Quickly roll a d2, d6, d20, or d100 right from the home screen with a long press on the app icon.
